root.name: Supreme Snowboarding
root.description: OverviewBoarder Zone (known as Supreme Snowboarding in European countries) is a snowboarding game developed by Housemarque (PC and canceled Dreamcast versions) and Software Creations (Game Boy Color version). Supreme Snowboarding was published by Infogrames on both of the released platforms.In the European releases Boarder Zone was titled Supreme Snowboarding. There was a Dreamcast port of the game being developed but was ultimately canceled.
